aboutMe.title: Creative thinker
aboutMe.subtitle: Minimalism lover
aboutMe.description: Hi, I'm Almila. I'm a full-stack developer. If you are looking for a Developer who is to craft solid and scalable frontend products with great user experiences. Let's shake hands with me.

items.title: JavaScript
items.description: Comprehensive knowledge and experience in JavaScript development. Expert in developing web applications.

items.title: React.js
items.description: Experienced in creating modern and scalable user interfaces using React.

items.title: Node.js
items.description: Extensive experience in backend development with Node.js. API development and server management.

items.title: Redux
items.description: Experienced in state management with Redux. Ability to manage complex application states.

items.title: VS Code
items.description: Expert in efficient use of VS Code and optimizing development environment.

items.title: Figma
items.description: Experienced in managing design processes with Figma and converting UI/UX designs to code.

profile.title: Profile
profile.aboutMeText: Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet I'm excited about software to be developed. I'm here to develop work-oriented projects with Veniam studies. I love creating minimal designs and user-friendly interfaces. I'm always open to learning new technologies and improving myself.

items.title: Workintech
items.description: A simple, customizable, minimal setup cookie plugin that allows your users to select which cookies to accept or decline. This web builder and js interface is available as a NPM package and supports any kind of repository builder for code and theme purposes.
